definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste

pinyin: di1 fang4 she4 xing4 fei4 wu4

sentences.english: Today, many e-wastes added into national hazardous waste list.
sentences.chinese: 今天，许多电子废物上了国家危险废物名录。

sentences.english: Today, many e-wastes added into national hazardous waste list.
sentences.chinese: 今天，许多电子废物上了国家危险废物名录。

sentences.english: Composting is a general treatment method for organic solid waste.
sentences.chinese: 堆肥化是处理有机固体废物的主要方法之一。

sentences.english: Dioxins are unwanted byproducts of some industrial processes and waste incineration.
sentences.chinese: 二恶英是一些工业过程和废物焚化的有害副产品。

sentences.english: Any waste liquid or material shall be handled per the specific plant procedure.
sentences.chinese: 任何废液或废物料要根据全厂特定程序进行处理。

sentences.english: Following the meal, food containers are discarded in the trash compartment below the mid-deck floor.
sentences.chinese: 饭后，食物盒被丢弃在中隔舱地板下的废物间。

sentences.english: An egg which is free from a foetus is the wave tide which wants quilt time to flush a discard.
sentences.chinese: 一个不受胎的蛋，是要被时间的浪潮冲刷成废物的。

sentences.english: Transfer waste to an approved waste reception facility ashore.
sentences.chinese: 将废物转移到认可的岸上废物接收装置。

sentences.english: Transfer waste to an approved waste reception facility ashore.
sentences.chinese: 将废物转移到认可的岸上废物接收装置。

sentences.english: The city council is axing recycling facilities in order to save money.
sentences.chinese: 市政会为了省钱正在削减废物回收利用设施。

sentences.english: They dispose of the city's waste in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们把城市的废物倒入大海处理掉。

sentences.english: China generates a total of 9 million tons of hazardous waste every year.
sentences.chinese: 中国每年产生有害废物的总数为九百万吨。

sentences.english: I convert waste into wealth," he says.
sentences.chinese: 我将废物转变为财富，”他说。

sentences.english: The waste by-products created from the paper making process is another concern.
sentences.chinese: 废物的产品创造了决策过程是另一个关注的问题。

sentences.english: In other words, almost all "waste" can be recycled.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，几乎所有的“废物”都可以回收利用。

sentences.english: You're supposed to separate out your recyclables and put them in a separate bin.
sentences.chinese: 你应该把可以回收的废物分开，放到不同的垃圾箱。

definition: wine sack, food bag (idiom); useless person, only fit for guzzling and boozing
to fart/to break wind/to talk nonsense/Utter rubbish!
rice tub (from which cooked rice or other food is served)/(fig.) fathead/a good-for-nothing
